clear.alert: Are you sure you want to clear all session messages?
clear.desc: This will clear all session and character data, including session list, character list, session messages, etc.
clear.tip: This action cannot be undone. Once cleared, the data cannot be recovered. Please proceed with caution.
clear.title: Clear All Session Messages

clearCache.alert: Are you sure you want to clear all caches?
clearCache.desc: This will clear the application's downloaded data cache, including character model data, voice data, dance model data, audio data, and more.
clearCache.tip: This action cannot be undone. After clearing, data will need to be re-downloaded. Please proceed with caution.
clearCache.title: Clear Data Cache

reset.alert: Are you sure you want to reset all system settings?
reset.desc: This will reset all system settings, including theme settings, chat settings, language model settings, etc.
reset.tip: This action cannot be undone. Once reset, the data cannot be recovered. Please proceed with caution.
reset.title: Reset System Settings

neutralColor.desc: Customize grayscale for different color tendencies
neutralColor.title: Neutral Color

check.desc: Verify if the API Key and proxy address are set correctly
check.error: Failed to call the API. Please check if the API Key and proxy address are set correctly.
check.title: Connectivity Check

apiKey.desc: Please use your own OpenAI Key
apiKey.title: API Key

openai.callError: Failed to call the API. Please check if the API Key and proxy address are set correctly.
openai.checkError: Check failed, please verify that the API key and interface proxy address are set correctly

fetchOnClient.desc: The client request mode will initiate session requests directly from the browser, which can improve response speed
fetchOnClient.title: Client Call

openai.title: OpenAI Language Model

clientCall.desc: When enabled, the voice synthesis service will be called from the client, resulting in faster voice synthesis, but it requires a VPN or the ability to access the internet.
clientCall.title: Client Call
